description: This file contains unit tests for the OptionalType class, testing its basic functionality such as creation, assignment, comparison, and value retrieval.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class representing an optional value that may or may not be set.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears the stored value, marking the optional as not set.

methods.name: IsSet
methods.description: Checks if the optional currently holds a value.
